Vlad straightened back on the table again and closed his eyes.

Vlad: It matters not. No one here knows what I am talking about when I 
speak of caste or even of honor! How low can you machines be so that 
you do not even know about honor?!

He was tired and started to get depressed.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "My name's Phoenix," the femme exlpains, "and as far as caste is 
> concerned ... well, my function is as a healer.  Does that help?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Vlad: Well, I suppose it is not your fault. What is your name, and 
> > what caste do you belong to?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Phoenix shrugs.  "I'm new here, I don't know what the Predacons 
> do 
> > > with their prisoners."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Vlad looks at her with a disgusted stare.
> > > > 
> > > > Vlad: I assume I am a prisoner if I am in a cell, quiaff? What 
> > for?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > OOC: Gah, stupid net connection ...
> > > > > 
> > > > > Phoenix shies away even though she knows Vlad can't get at 
> her 
> > > > > through the bars.  "Hey, cool down," she pleads.  "You'll 
> just 
> > > get 
> > > > > yourself into trouble acting like that.  Anyway, I think 
> that's 
> > > how 
> > > > > Predacons operate as a rule."
